frontmatter.title: Make Everyone Data Savvy, Forget Data Science.
frontmatter.short: Data savvy managers use data for execution, putting insight into context to make things happen. Mckinsey predicts a shortfall in meeting the demand for 1.5 million data savvy managers. According to the American Management Association 75% of companies report they are ill-equipped to meet current analytics needs.
frontmatter.keywords: business intelligence reporting, data driven decision making, data driven decisions, using data to make decisions
